title: Peeping Life x Kaijuu Sakaba Kaiji: Kaijuu-tachi ga Iru Tokoro
synopsis: Peeping Life collaboration with Kaijuu Sakaba, a real tavern where kaijuu costumes from the Ultraman franchise are on display. Events are held where people can dine with the actors dressed in the kaijuu costumes.
related_anime: ['Peeping Life', 'Peeping Life x I-O Data: Quiz!! Input Output', 'Kaijuu Sakaba Kanpai!']
